name: Metolius Magnum Crash Pad
description: A massive landing zone for high-ballers that also doubles as a van-sized, road-tripping mattress for low-rollers. Three large panels with angled hinges reduce dead spots and help prevent rolled ankles on impact. Sandwiched foam construction is durable and provides welcome fall absorption. Carpeted shoe-wipe keeps soles clean for sticky sends.Durable body fabric with Ballistic nylon on the bottom.Unbreakable aluminum buckles.Closure flap reverses to protect the shoulder straps when they're on the ground.Padded shoulder straps for comfort while cruising problemsSmall outer stash pocket and large inner pocket keep shoes and chalk and other crucial items secure.
